objects.text:
40H Long Playtime
Hi-Res Audio Quality
BassUp Technology
Transparency Mode

product_details.description: Hybrid Active Noise Cancelling: 2 internal and 2 external mics work in tandem to detect external noise and effectively reduce up to 90% of it, such as planes and car engines. Immerse Yourself in Detailed Audio: The noise cancelling headphones have oversized 40mm dynamic drivers that produce detailed sound and thumping beats with BassUp technology. Compatible with Hi-Res certified audio via the AUX cable for more detail. 40-Hour Long Battery Life and Fast Charging: With 40 hours of battery life with ANC on and 60 hours in normal mode, you can commute in peace with your Bluetooth headphones without thinking about recharging. Fast charge for 5 mins to get an extra 4 hours of playtime. Dual-Connections: Connect to two devices simultaneously with Bluetooth 5.0 and instantly switch between them. Whether you're working on your laptop, or need to take a phone call, audio from your Bluetooth headphones will automatically play from the device you need to hear from. App for EQ Customization: Download the soundcore app to tailor your sound using the customizable EQ, with 22 presets, or adjust it yourself. You can also switch between 3 modes: ANC, Normal, and Transparency, and relax with white noise. Hear Your Surroundings: Switch to Transparency mode on your noise cancelling headphones when you need to be aware of your surroundings, such as transportation announcements, crossing the road, or just staying connected to the world around you. Brand - Soundcore ** Color - White ** Ear Placement - Over Ear ** Form Factor - Over Ear ** Impedance - 16 Ohm **

banner_details:
This banner promotes a wireless headphone product using a clean, modern layout anchored by a large central product image ("product_image"). The background features a diagonal dual-gradient in varying shades of blue, enhanced with geometric overlays, giving it a high-tech and energetic aesthetic. The bold main title ("heading") at the top sets the brand name in strong white font, followed by a lighter secondary identifier ("subheading") in soft blue. A prominent feature descriptor ("tagline") emphasizes a key product capability. Below that, detailed specifications are listed in subtle gray-blue text ("description"). The price ("price") is bold and highly visible in large white font. A light blue rectangular button with rounded edges ("cta_button") and a contrasting dark blue text call-to-action ("cta") completes the promotional layout. The overall look combines clarity and impact, ideal for attracting interest in a high-quality audio product.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Navy Blue: #2A4365  
- Sky Blue: #4299E1  
- Soft Blue Accent: #90CDF4  
- Light Gray Text: #E2E8F0  
- White: #FFFFFF  
- Dark Text Blue: #2A4365  
- Accent Gradient Range: #2C5282 to #3182CE
product_color: The product image of the headphones features a sleek and minimalist color palette dominated by soft neutral tones. The primary color is an elegant ivory beige (#F5F1E7), giving the product a premium and understated feel. Subtle shadows and contours are defined using light camel tones (#E7E1D6) and soft grays (#D9D5CF) around the ear pads and headband joints, smoothly blending to create visual depth. Highlights with near-white accents (#FAF8F3) add to the clean aesthetic, drawing focus to design elements like the brand logo and control buttons. This refined palette exudes sophistication, ideal for an advertisement banner with muted elegance and modern luxury.
